title: Forkchoice crashed
body:
<!--NOTE: -->
<!--- General questions should go to the discord chat instead of the issue tracker.-->

**Describe the bug**
<!--A clear and concise description of what the bug is and steps to reproduce it.-->
While syncing near head of altona, forkchoice crashed.

![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/8836210/89230769-47acfb00-d5e4-11ea-8748-7e2731cb7f4f.png)

Full log:
```

(node:19060) UnhandledPromiseRejectionWarning: RangeError: Maximum call stack size exceeded

    at ArrayDagLMDGHOST.getJustifiedCheckpoint (/home/mpetrunic/projects/eth2/lodestar/packages/lodestar/lib/chain/forkChoice/arrayDag/lmdGhost.js:617:45)
    at ArrayDagLMDGHOST.isCandidateForBestTarget (/home/mpetrunic/projects/eth2/lodestar/packages/lodestar/lib/chain/forkChoice/arrayDag/lmdGhost.js:530:52)
    at ArrayDagLMDGHOST.propagateWeightChange (/home/mpetrunic/projects/eth2/lodestar/packages/lodestar/lib/chain/forkChoice/arrayDag/lmdGhost.js:511:69)
    at ArrayDagLMDGHOST.propagateWeightChange (/home/mpetrunic/projects/eth2/lodestar/packages/lodestar/lib/chain/forkChoice/arrayDag/lmdGhost.js:515:12)

    at ArrayDagLMDGHOST.propagateWeightChange (/home/mpetrunic/projects/eth2/lodestar/packages/lodestar/lib/chain/forkChoice/arrayDag/lmdGhost.js:515:12)
    at ArrayDagLMDGHOST.propagateWeightChange (/home/mpetrunic/projects/eth2/lodestar/packages/lodestar/lib/chain/forkChoice/arrayDag/lmdGhost.js:515:12)
(node:19060) UnhandledPromiseRejectionWarning: Unhandled promise rejection. This error originated either by throwing inside of an async function without a catch block, or by rejecting a promise which was not handled with .catch(). (rejection id: 1)
(node:19060) [DEP0018] DeprecationWarning: Unhandled promise rejections are deprecated. In the future, promise rejections that are not handled will terminate the Node.js process with a non-zero exit code.
2020-08-03 23:48:54  [NETWORK]       verbose: receive beacon_blocks_by_range response with 5 chunks from 16Uiu2HAmTVrGFfE6sSw8aKmDFi1nyXa7qiRrAYEppL7DPJNxVCY2 requestId=04989dc4bd2fea31, encoding=ssz_snappy, body={"startSlot":"254661","count":"21","step":"1"}

```
should we close this since altona is no longer relevant?  or is this issue happening in medalla as well?
It's not really related to altona, this seems like some infinite (too much at least) recursion call
We're working to refactor fork choice to remove recursion
